title: LSP-YOLO: A Lightweight Single-Stage Network for Sitting Posture Recognition on Embedded Devices
summary: With the rise in sedentary behavior, health problems caused by poor sitting posture have drawn increasing attention. Most existing methods, whether using invasive sensors or computer vision, rely on two-stage pipelines, which result in high intrusiveness, intensive computation, and poor real-time performance on embedded edge devices.
